raytw.sdk.comic.comicsdk

Class Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • raytw.sdk.comic.comicsdk.Parser

  • public class Parser
extends java.lang.Object
    解析從漫畫網站讀取到的html格式字串內容，將內容轉換成Comic、Episode物件.
    Author:
    Ray Lee Created on 2017/08/11
